name: Pirate Solitaire. Sea Wolves Free
description:
Outwit the old sea dog and seize the pirates' gold!

Play solitaire right on the deck of the reavers' ship.

Levels of varying difficulty promise several hours of exciting gameplay, and unique golden cards make the game even more interesting.

- A solitaire game
- Game mechanics – choosing pairs of cards
- More than 100 levels of varying difficulty
- Special golden cards on every level
- An appealing adventure setting
